title: Advanced String Extractor from Character Array
name: LGF_ExtractStringFromCharArrayAdv
description: The function extracts a String specified by a text before and after from an array of characters with extended options.

input.name: textBefore
input.description: Text in front of the characters which has to be extracted

input.name: textAfter
input.description: Text behind the characters which has to be extracted

input.name: includeBeforeAfter
input.description: TRUE: textBefore and textAfter are included in the extracted string

input.name: startPos
input.description: Position within the array to start search from (index zero based)

output.name: position
output.description: Position (index) within the array where text begins (index zero based)

output.name: length
output.description: Length of text that was extracted

in/out.name: searchIn
in/out.description: Array of Character or Byte to search in

return_value.description: Return value: Status of the FB
